messages.subject: Re: Making Waves?  Let's Go Surfing!!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/7/99 7:03:10 PM EST, tn-k4of5@if.rmci.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/7/99 7:03:10 PM EST, tn-k4of5@... writes:

<< Anyway, I think it was a misunderstanding, and can we all KISS and
MAKE UP now? Here, I'll start...
XXXXXXXXXXXXSMOOCHXXXXXXXXXXXXX!!!! >>
Nanci! you old smooth talker you! LOL, I agree wholeheartedly
Teresa

messages.subject: Re: Making Waves?  Let's Go Surfing!!
messages.msgSnippet: ... I wish we could all just cool it also.  I enjoy everyone s friendship and input here, and I don t like to argue.  We are here to share ideas, what would
messages.messageBody:
>Now, I sure didn't join this list to get into a big hairy argument and
>pollute the listwaves with it, but I will respond to publicly made
>innuendos. My sincere apologies to all. I will not address these
>issues again. Any further differings with how I do things regarding
>unschooling I will post with individuals personally, regardless of where
>they post their comments. I thank the list participants and moderators
>for being so gracious, and again, I apoligize for creating an entry that
>made so many waves.
>
>Sincerely and with Love
>DJ Brewer

I wish we could all just "cool it" also. I enjoy everyone's friendship and
input here, and I don't like to argue. We are here to share ideas, what
would be the point of sharing ideas if we all had exactly the same ideas?
Anyway, I can understand DJ's defensiveness, because picking apart
someone's message and interjecting arguments and counterpoints for each
point can look very much like agressive judgement. However, I also,
knowing this list, do not think that argument or judgement were MEANT by
it. I can just see how someone unfamiliar with the list community here
would feel attacked after getting this message right off the bat, I know I
would! Anyway, I think it was a misunderstanding, and can we all KISS and
MAKE UP now? Here, I'll start...
XXXXXXXXXXXXSMOOCHXXXXXXXXXXXXX!!!!

Nanci K. in Idaho
